Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - org.eclipse.vorto.core.api.model.mapping.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.ByteArrayInputStream' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.context.request.RequestContextHolder'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.*' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.context.request.RequestContextHolder'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool' import. Should be before 'org.springframework.web.context.request.RequestContextHolder'.
